00023 template <typename Base>
00024 class TQtDocumentManagerWrap: public Base
00025 {
00026 public:
00027        typedef Base BaseClass;
00028 
00029        // pseudo-reimplemented (idoc::IDocumentManager)
00030        virtual int GetAllowedOperationFlags(const istd::IPolymorphic* viewPtr = NULL) const;
00031        virtual void FilePrint(int documentIndex = -1) const;
00032 };

00035 
00036 // reimplemented (idoc::IDocumentManager)
00037 
00038 template <typename Base>
00039 int TQtDocumentManagerWrap<Base>::GetAllowedOperationFlags(const istd::IPolymorphic* viewPtr) const
00040 {
00041        int retVal = BaseClass::GetAllowedOperationFlags(viewPtr);
00042 
00043        if (viewPtr == NULL){
00044               viewPtr = BaseClass::GetActiveView();
00045        }
00046 
00047        if (dynamic_cast<const iqtdoc::IPrintable*>(viewPtr) != NULL){
00048               retVal |= idoc::IDocumentManager::OF_FILE_PRINT;
00049        }
00050 
00051        return retVal;
00052 }
00053 
00054 
00055 template <typename Base>
00056 void TQtDocumentManagerWrap<Base>::FilePrint(int documentIndex) const
00057 {
00058        istd::IPolymorphic* activeViewPtr = NULL;
00059        if (documentIndex >= 0){
00060               I_ASSERT(documentIndex < GetDocumentsCount());
00061 
00062               if (BaseClass::GetViewsCount(documentIndex) > 0){
00063                      activeViewPtr = BaseClass::GetViewFromIndex(documentIndex, 0);
00064               }
00065        }
00066        else{
00067               activeViewPtr = BaseClass::GetActiveView();
00068        }
00069 
00070        if (activeViewPtr != NULL){
00071               iqtdoc::IPrintable* printablePtr = dynamic_cast<iqtdoc::IPrintable*>(activeViewPtr);
00072               if (printablePtr != NULL){
00073                      QPrinter printer(QPrinter::HighResolution);
00074                      QPrintDialog printerDialog(&printer);
00075 
00076                      if (printerDialog.exec() == QDialog::Accepted){
00077                             printablePtr->Print(printerDialog.printer());
00078                      }
00079               }
00080        }
00081 }
